backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping romantic animation features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for key frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark mode tokens, and global border/background styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main Valentine interaction UI with floating hearts, animated transitions, Yes/No button behaviors, and success screen.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, statuses, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with romantic color palette, animations, floating hearts, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility merging classNames using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entrypoint setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color variables, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's scaffold state, listing existing ICP dapp features, versions, and enhancement feature metadata.
